Secondary Wires Select an action Wires Wire Types Secondary wire types are defined only once at first. Then you should insert the secondary wires and registered them in their respective positions. When the operator conducts a new inspection the correct secondary wire is taken based on the position and characteristics which are registered.
Item Information Add information about the types of your mooring lines. You can find the following information on the certificates of your mooring line. You only have to insert it once and it will be available to you for all future inspections. List with all secondary wires to delete. Type Is this the current rope position? Manufacturer Model Serial Number Diameter (mm) Length (m) Material Certificate Date Working Length Breaking Force (tn) Total Work hours Save Cancel Back
Position Outer Rope Has Tail? Tail Retire Wire?retire_date Date of retirement
Synthetic Rope Inspection Wire Rope Inspection Select an action: Start Routine Inspection Start Detailed Inspection Resume Previous Inspection Inspections should be performed frequently. Select the positions from the list in which you want to start an inspection. If you have unfinished inspections you can resume them later
